text: Mu vyukuri umusozi wa (Swafaa) na (Marwat) nimubimenyetso vy’uguhayagiza idini ry’Imana, rero uwugize igisabisho (c’iHija) kuri iyo ngoro ntagatifu canke akagira igisabisho kigufiya citiriwe (Umrat) ntagicumuro kiba kuriwe akikuje iyo mitumba yose uko ari ibiri, rero n’uwugize ineza iyariyo yose nuko Imana ariyo nyene gushima nanyene ubumenyi bw’ibintu vyose
